metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000341 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier DSA signature generation is vulnerable to timing attack. Where timings can be closely observed for the generation of signatures, the lack of blinding in 1.55, or earlier, may allow an attacker to gain information about the signature's k value and ultimately the private value as well.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.60-1').
